<%inherit file="base.html"/> <%namespace name="tocns" file="toc.html"/> <%namespace name="nav" file="nav.html"/> ${tocns.toc(toc=toc, extension=extension, paged=False)} <%def name="title()"> Mako Documentation % for file in toc.filenames: <% item = toc.get_by_file(file) %>
${nav.pagenav(item=item, paged=False)}
${self.get_namespace(file + '.html').body(paged=False, toc=toc, extension=extension)} % endfor
